refsect2.title: rasqal_new_query_results ()
refsect2.programlisting: rasqal_query_results * rasqal_new_query_results (rasqal_world *world, rasqal_query *query, rasqal_query_results_type type, rasqal_variables_table *vars_table);

warning.para: rasqal_new_query_results is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Constructor - create a new query results set
Deprecated for rasqal_new_query_results2() that loses the unused argument.
The query may be NULL for result set objects that are standalone and not attached to any particular query

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a new query result object or NULL on failure

refsect2.title: rasqal_new_query_results2 ()
refsect2.para: Constructor - create a new query results set
The query may be NULL for result set objects that are standalone and not attached to any particular query

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a new query result object or NULL on failure

refsect2.title: rasqal_new_query_results_from_string ()
refsect2.para: Constructor - create a new query results set from a results format string

entry.para: base URI of query results format (or NULL)
length of string (or 0 to calculate it here)

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a new query result object or NULL on failure

refsect2.title: rasqal_free_query_results ()
refsect2.para: Destructor - destroy a rasqal_query_results.

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_add_row ()
refsect2.para: Add a query result row to the sequence of result rows

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: non-0 on failure

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_finished ()
refsect2.para: Find out if binding results are exhausted.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: non-0 if results are finished or query failed

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_get_binding_name ()
refsect2.para: Get binding name for the current result.

entry.para: offset of binding name into array of known names

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a pointer to a shared copy of the binding name or NULL on failure

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_get_binding_value ()
refsect2.para: Get one binding value for the current result.

entry.para: offset of binding name into array of known names

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a pointer to a shared rasqal_literal binding value or NULL on failure

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_get_binding_value_by_name ()
refsect2.para: Get one binding value for a given name in the current result.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a pointer to a shared rasqal_literal binding value or NULL on failure

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_get_bindings ()
refsect2.para: Get all binding names, values for current result.
If names is not NULL, it is set to the address of a shared array of names of the bindings (an output parameter). These names are shared and must not be freed by the caller
If values is not NULL, it is set to the address of a shared array of rasqal_literal* binding values. These values are shaerd and must not be freed by the caller.

entry.para: pointer to an array of binding names (or NULL)
pointer to an array of binding value rasqal_literal (or NULL)

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: non-0 if the assignment failed

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_get_bindings_count ()
refsect2.para: Get the number of bound variables in the result.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: <0 if failed or results exhausted

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_get_boolean ()
refsect2.para: Get boolean query result.
The return value is only meaningful if this is a boolean query result - see rasqal_query_results_is_boolean()

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: boolean query result - >0 is true, 0 is false, <0 on error

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_get_count ()
refsect2.para: Get number of bindings so far.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: number of bindings found so far or < 0 on failure

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_get_query ()
refsect2.para: Get thq query associated with this query result

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: shared pointer to query object

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_get_triple ()
refsect2.para: Get the current triple in the result.
The return value is a shared raptor_statement.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: raptor_statement or NULL if failed or results exhausted

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_get_row_by_offset ()
refsect2.para: Get stored result row by an offset
The result_offset index is 0-indexed into the subset of results constrained by any query limit and offset.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: row or NULL if result_offset is out of range

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_get_type ()
refsect2.para: Get query results type

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: non-0 if true

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_is_bindings ()
refsect2.para: Test if rasqal_query_results is variable bindings format.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: non-0 if true

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_is_boolean ()
refsect2.para: Test if rasqal_query_results is boolean format.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: non-0 if true

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_is_graph ()
refsect2.para: Test if rasqal_query_results is RDF graph format.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: non-0 if true

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_is_syntax ()
refsect2.para: Test if the rasqal_query_results is a syntax.
Many of the query results may be formatted as a syntax using the rasqal_query_formatter class however this function returns true if a syntax result was specifically requested.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: non-0 if true

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_next ()
refsect2.para: Move to the next result.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: non-0 if failed or results exhausted

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_next_triple ()
refsect2.para: Move to the next triple result.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: non-0 if failed or results exhausted

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_read ()
refsect2.para: Read the query results from an iostream in a format.
This uses the rasqal_query_results_formatter class and the rasqal_query_results_formatter_read() method to perform the formatting.
See rasqal_world_get_query_results_format_description() for obtaining the supported format URIs at run time.

entry.para: raptor_iostream to read the query from
raptor_uri describing the format to read (or NULL for default)
raptor_uri base URI of the input format

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: non-0 on failure

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_write ()
refsect2.para: Write the query results to an iostream in a format.
This uses the rasqal_query_results_formatter class and the rasqal_query_results_formatter_write() method to perform the formatting.
Note that after calling this method, the query results will be empty and rasqal_query_results_finished() will return true (non-0)
See rasqal_world_get_query_results_format_description() for obtaining the supported format names, mime_types and URIs at run time.

entry.para: raptor_iostream to write the query to
raptor_uri describing the format to write (or NULL for default)
raptor_uri base URI of the output format

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: non-0 on failure

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_type_label ()
refsect2.para: Get a label for a query results type

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: label or NULL on failure (invalid type)

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results_rewind ()
refsect2.para: Rewind stored query results to start
This requires rasqal_query_set_store_results() to be called before query execution.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: non-0 if rewinding is not available when results are not stored

refsect2.title: rasqal_query_results
refsect2.para: Rasqal query results class.

refsect2.title: enum rasqal_query_results_type
refsect2.para: Query result type.
